import React, { Component } from "react" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import { DataContext } from "./Context" export class Header extends Component { static contextType = DataContext constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { value: "0", optiune: "0" } } render() { console.log(this.state.value) console.log(this.state.optiune) const { categories, updateCategory, currentCurrency } = this.context return (
{categories.map(({ name }) => (
  • updateCategory(name)} > {name}
))}
Cart
) } } export default Header
